text:
Friends! I’m so excited to announce my very 
own YouTube Channel Membership: a way for

you to support my channel and get some perks! By 
clicking the join button below this or any video

on my channel, you not only help fund the creation 
of my videos, but you get some great benefits too.

A YouTube membership is a way for you to show 
ongoing support over time. It’s a small monthly

fee at two levels. At Rachel’s Circle, you get a 
badge next to your username that sets you apart

from the general public. This allows your comments 
to pop to get more noticed, I see that and I know,

“this is a supporter”. You also get access to 
exclusive emoji’s and gifs, or jifs, depending

on your preferred pronunciation. You can throw 
these into comments and the more members I have,

the more I can make, which means we can start 
our own language and inside jokes with them.

Rachel’s Circle also gets early 
access to my videos, and yes,
some of them are ready one or two weeks early.

If you want to level up, there’s 
Rachel’s Superstars. At this level,

you get everything that Rachel’s Circle 
gets, but you also get monthly audio lessons.

These are created just for the superstars. Each 
month you’ll submit your email to me and bam,

in your inbox, your audio lesson. Sort of 
like my podcast; It’s my voice, in your ear.

I’m going to be getting a little more personal 
here. More personal stories in these lessons. And

of course, I’m going to ask you, my superstars, 
what you want me to talk about in upcoming audio

lessons. Each month, a new lesson. And there’s one 
ready right now, waiting for you when you join.

So simply click the join button under any video 
or on my channel page. Choose your level, choose

your perks, make sure that’s Superstar for the 
audio lessons, and your access starts right away.

Thank you so much for your support, you 
know I love being your English teacher.
